UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Enhanced Antimicrobial Screening Sensitivity Enabled the Identification of an Ultrashort Peptide KR-8 for Engineering of LL-37mini to Combat Drug-Resistant Pathogens.
Literature.Author: Mechesso AF, Su Y, Xie J, Wang G

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human keratinocytes HaCat:50% Cell death=>100 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus USA 300(MIC=>32µM),Escherichia coli E423-17(MIC=>32µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa E411-17(MIC=>32µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae E406-17(MIC=>32µM),Acinetobacter baumannii B28-16(MIC=>32µM)
